item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter, 2–8 September 2024 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Liberal Alliance (EPP): 2–3 seats
  • Danmarksdemokraterne (ECR): 1–2 seats
  • Det Konservative Folkeparti (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Radikale Venstre (RE): 0–1 seats
  • Socialistisk Folkeparti (Greens/EFA): 2–3 seats
  • Socialdemokraterne (S&D): 3–4 seats
  • Dansk Folkeparti (PfE): 0–1 seats
  • Enhedslisten–De Rød-Grønne (GUE/NGL): 1 seats
  • Moderaterne (RE): 0–1 seats
  • Venstre (RE): 1–2 seats
  • Alternativet (Greens/EFA): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter, 2–8 September 2024 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Liberal Alliance (EPP): 10.1–14.1%

  • Det Konservative Folkeparti (EPP): 4.8–7.8%

  • Moderaterne (RE): 3.4–6.0%
  • Venstre (RE): 8.7–12.5%
  • Alternativet (Greens/EFA): 1.2–2.9%
